title: Mapo Tofu
description: Mapo tofu (麻婆豆腐, ma po dou fu) is one of the most popular dishes from Sichuan cuisine. The tofu pieces are braised in a rich spicy, and savoury sauce along with fresh garlic and scallions, with a small amount of ground pork to enhance the flavour. The dish is so appetizing and it goes perfectly with steamed rice.

title: Brazilian Fish Stew (Moqueca Baiana)
description: Fish Stews can be so boring…but not a BRAZILIAN Fish Stew!! With a fragrant tomato coconut sauce with a fresh hit of lime, this is such a different exotic way to serve up fish that is off the charts delicious – yet simple to make.

title: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: The Bolognese Sauce is rich, thick and has beautiful depth of flavour. It’s perfect for a quick midweek meal but even better if you can simmer it for a couple of hours! Serve it over pasta, stuff into jacket potatoes, make an epic Lasagna or Baked Spaghetti Pie!
